title: In-Between Work and Play
description: Jocelyn Frost, therapist to demigoddesses, is about to lose her job. In an effort to keep her job Jocelyn takes on the task of trying to find the one thing all of the highly fertile demigoddess want most, a contraceptive method that actually works. But that is only one of her troubles. The people in her life are getting hurt and for no reason that Jocelyn can discern, she is at the center of it all. With only a couple of days to find a solution, she will need to battle more than just the dark forces that are trying to sabotage her efforts. Jocelyn will have to come to terms with her own self-doubt and rely on new friends to help keep her safe. Warning: Due to language and sexual content this novel is not suitable for readers under the age of 18.
author: Relina Skye
